div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 476 Greece, northern, before 1840 (456) Burial: c. 175-165 B.C. (T) Contents: 3000+ AR Macedonia: tetrob. (one-quarter of the hd.) Histiaea: tetrob. (three-quarters of hd.) Disposition: H. P. Borrell some Borrell, NC 1840, p. 236 Possibly the same hd. as no. 475 above
